LoginResource - Class in api
The login resource performs authentication using GoogleDocs's class and on failure redirects again to Google's authentication page, and on success redirects to the filelisting for all devices at URL "/all/html/filelist".
LoginResource(Context, Request, Response) - Constructor for class api.LoginResource
Construct the resource.
LogoutCommand - Class in client
Handle the logout command.
LogoutCommand() - Constructor for class client.LogoutCommand
 
LogoutResource - Class in api
The logout resource clears the cookies and sends the user to the login page.
LogoutResource(Context, Request, Response) - Constructor for class api.LogoutResource
Construct the resource.
